item.title: Part I
item.description: Game Series Part I InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on November 11th, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Part II
item.description: Game Series Part II InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on December 2nd, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Part III
item.description: Game Series Part III Coming to WLMAC on December 16th, 2021!Premiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels…

item.title: Leaderboard
item.description: InfoParticipate to earn GAME DEV POINTS, which will award you with a surprise during the Game Jam! Each participation will be worth 200 points, with winners of the special challenges earning an extra 100 points per challenge. Rank Name Part I Part II Part III Total Points 1 Luka Jovanovic 200 +100 200 +300 800 2 Michael C 200 +90 200 +260 750 3 BattleMage_ 200 +100 200 +240 740 4 Maplefin 200 +60 200 +220 680 5 AZron 200 +100 200 +160 660 5 RedWiz 200 +60 200 +200 660 7 Chelsea Wong 200 +100 200 +140 640 7 alexa 200 +60 200 +180 640 9 Lost_Cactus 200 +50 200 +120 570 10 lukas142434 200 +20 200 +100 520 11 Felix 200 +10 200 +100 510 12 3xp3rtz 200 +280 480 13 Sarah Zhao 200 +10 200 410 14 Formoon28 200 200 400 14 Arjun 200 200 400 14 Anthony Zanchetta 200 200 400 14 Aidan Wang 200 200 400 18 MuteMini 200 +100 300 18 MarsFlat 200 +100 300 18 CodeBeginner 200 +100 300 21 Ryan Atlas 200 +90 290 22 C.
